value.title: A look at Visual Data Prep in Power BI dataflows
value.excerpt: Have you noticed the updates Power BI dataflows has had recently? Patrick explores Visual Data Prep which helps you craft your transforms in Power Query Online.  Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/blog/announcing-visual-data-prep-public-preview-diagram-view-in-power-query/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: A way to get rid of the pie chart in Power BI Desktop?!?
value.excerpt: Patrick shows you how to get rid of the pie chart in Power BI Desktop. Finally a way to remove the temptation! value.title: Adam & Patrick Unplugged - April 2017 [EP2]
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick and I talk about what is on our minds. We take a look at some updates in Analysis Services 2017 CTP 2.0. We look at the new navigation experience in Power BI that is coming out in early May. We also talk about some friends, Santa Clause and Power BI reports in Reporting Services.

value.title: API's, Prototyping, Size increase - Roundup #45
value.excerpt: Steve Howards looks at working with OData and OAuth with Power BI. Bill Anton looks at prototyping and comparing Power BI Desktop to Power Pivot/Excel. We also had a few updates from the Power BI team regarding Q&A working with direct connections via the enterprise gateway, Query Parameters and Templating

value.title: Are you mobile?
value.excerpt: I take a look at the different mobile apps for Power BI. From the iOS apps (for iPhone and iPad), to Android and the new Windows 10 Universal App.  You can also connect to an on-premises Reporting Services server to look at mobile reports.  Spud Trooper and Darth Potato are there to help!  SUBSCRIBE!

value.title: Are you using the right Dataflows connector in Power BI???
value.excerpt: Did you know that there are two Dataflows connectors in Power BI? What's the difference? Adam takes a look and explains what is going on.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level? value.title: Attending SQLBits for the first time
value.excerpt: I had the opportunity to attend SQLBits for the first time in the UK. This was an outstanding event with great people and an awesome attendee party. This clip are some highlights from the event to hopefully convey what it was like to attend. This event really showed how great the SQL Family is!!!  Music

value.title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
value.excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.  With looking at the upcoming Power BI GA, this may be handy for assigning multiple Free licenses to your users, or Pro licenses.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1
